frame.name: Distant_operated_IED
frame.definition:
<def-root>A improvised explosive device, the <fen>Bomb</fen>, is rigged to detonate when it receives a signal, typically by a wire that leads to a trigger. The trigger may be operated directly by the <fen>Detonator</fen>, in which case the weapon is known as a CWIED (command wire IED). Or, the triggering mechanism may be activated wirelessly, such as by a cell phone. In this case, the weapon is called an RCIED (remote control IED).
<ex>These photographs were taken in the wake of a <t><fex name="Bomb">CWIED</fex></t> attack on the British.</ex>
<ex>The purpose of this device is to prevent an <t><fex name="Bomb">RCIED</fex></t> from detonating.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Bomb
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Bomb</fen> is set off by the <fen>Detonator</fen> at a distance, injuring or damaging a <fen>Target</fen>.
<ex>These photographs were taken in the wake of a <t><fex name="Bomb">CWIED</fex></t> attack on the British.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition: <def-root>The type of activity that the <fen>Bomb</fen> is generally involved in. Often this can be considered a kind of <fen>Type</fen> specification also.</def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates what subtype of the general category the <fen>Bomb</fen> belongs to.</def-root>

FE.name: Detonator
FE.definition: <def-root>The person that wishes to attack the <fen>Target</fen> and who activates the <fen>Bomb</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies a part of the <fen>Bomb</fen>. This includes parts that aid in the detonation or damaging, or mere attachments.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>The term used to refer to the <fen>Bomb</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_creation
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which a <fen>Bomb</fen> comes into existence.</def-root>

FE.name: Creator
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual or group responsible for the creation of the <fen>Bomb</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>A description or characteristic of the <fen>Bomb</fen> not covered by more specific FEs.</def-root>

FE.name: Target
FE.definition: <def-root>The intended or actual target of the <fen>Bomb</fen>.</def-root>
